showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ eat something stretch your legs using the bathroom. You will find friendly employees here, they have wendy's and across the street they have McDonald's. For truckers you can stop and get a shower and rest this placed is quiet environment.

‚Ä¶ Kind employees from the managers to the shower attendants . Clean showers, great pressure , and clean towels/ wash clothes, as well as the shower areas. ‚Ä¶

Staff member Joseph was awesome. Thanks for going above and beyond. Looking for a hot shower, this is the best stop. Clean and well stocked store. Staff very friendly and family oriented. Thanks again!

Getting in and out is a bit tricky if the pumps are stacked with trucks. They've been constantly working to get their parking area fixed. But clean, professional employees, and an all around good place to stop, rest, shower, and get food.
